```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(timevis)
library(reshape2)


timeEPAGrant <- data.frame(
  id = 1:
    group = c(rep("Aerosols",3) rep("Fish Tissue",3), "Stress","Historical Analysis", "Survey", "Storytelling", "Focus Groups")
    content = c("Field Season", "Lab Analysis", "Writing", "Field Season", "Lab Analysis", "Writing", "Design Experiment,"  )
    start = c()
    end = c()
MyData <- read.csv(file="timeline_data.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")  
MyDataFrame <- data.frame(MyData)
MyDataFrame
group <- c(MyDataFrame["group"],M
group
timevis(data=MyDataFrame, groups=groups)
groups <- data.frame(group)
colnames(MyDataFrame)
```
